extensionDescription.message: Terminal-like to send json-rpc requests and use tools for Odoo developers

optionsTitleBehaviourElephant.message: Attempt to resolve unknown values (mainly the login name)

optionsTitleInitCommandsDescription.message: Run these commands when initialize the terminal (one per line). Be careful! changes here can cause unwanted exceptions. Note that the commands will be executed on all 'odoo' pages.

optionsTitleTerminalContextDescription.message: This context will be merged with the 'normal' context on terminal operations. In json format.

optionsTitleDeveloperZoneModeIgnoreCompC.message: Disable Odoo version checking (this can cause unwanted exceptions!)

optionsTitleDeveloperZoneModeConsoleErro.message: Show errors in the browser console
